entry.title: Sunday: Periods of rain or freezing rain. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing rain or rain changing to periods of rain and ending late this afternoon then cloudy. Rainfall amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 3. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Sunday 19 March 2023
